changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM posts WHERE id=2; INSERT posts ([Id], [Owner], [Parent], [Name], [Number], [DateCreate], [DateChange], [Author], [Access], [State], [IsInherits], [IsActual], [IsDeleted]) VALUES (2, NULL, NULL, N'Главный бухгалтер', NULL, CAST(0x0700000000009B390B AS DateTime2), CAST(0x07F000EB8B83933C0B AS DateTime2), 1, N'', 5, 1, 1, 0);
